import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets all suspects
getSuspects:function getSuspects(){return axios.get("/api/suspects");},// Gets the suspect with the given id
getSuspect:function getSuspect(id){return axios.get("/api/suspects/"+id);},// Deletes the suspect with the given id
deleteSuspect:function deleteSuspect(id){return axios.delete("/api/suspects/"+id);},// Saves a suspect to the database
saveSuspect:function saveSuspect(suspectData){return axios.post("/api/suspects",suspectData);}};
